title: How to Have an Adventure in Northern Japan
description: Ten cities and towns from Hokkaido to Tokyo.Travel to ancient mountain temples and fairy tale valleys, frozen metropolises and monster-haunted springs — with plenty of local cuisine and culture. Part memoir written from experience, part fully-informed guide with info straight from the source — full of wild stories, incredible locales, dynamic photography, travel tips, and all the people along the way. Author Raffael Coronelli invites you on the adventure of a lifetime through northern Japan.
author: Raffael Coronelli
